Sona.name: Sona
Sona.title: Maven of the Strings
Sona.lore: Sona is Demacia's foremost virtuoso of the stringed etwahl, speaking only through her graceful chords and vibrant arias. This genteel manner has endeared her to the highborn, though others suspect her spellbinding melodies to actually emanate magic—a Demacian taboo. Silent to outsiders but somehow understood by close companions, Sona plucks her harmonies not only to soothe injured allies, but also to strike down unsuspecting enemies.
Sona.blurb: Sona is Demacia's foremost virtuoso of the stringed etwahl, speaking only through her graceful chords and vibrant arias. This genteel manner has endeared her to the highborn, though others suspect her spellbinding melodies to actually emanate magic—a...
allytips: Make sure to tag your allies while Sona's auras are active, but avoid getting caught out by enemies.
Save Crescendo for the game-altering moment.
Well-timed uses of Aria of Perseverance will grant you maximum survivability.
enemytips: Spread out when you see Sona so she can't make your entire team dance.
Kill Sona first, as she will heal up her team if left alone for too long.

spells.name: Hymn of Valor
spells.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Sona deals {{ totaldamagett }} magic damage to the nearest two enemies, prioritizing champions. She then begins a new Melody.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting allied champions an additional {{ attackbonusdamagett }} magic damage on their next Attack. Granting an ally this effect will refund Sona {{ manarefund }} Mana once per cast.

spells.name: Aria of Perseverance
spells.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Sona restores {{ totalhealtt }} Health to herself and a nearby allied champion, prioritizing the most wounded. She then begins a new Melody.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting allied champions {{ totalshieldtt }} Shield for {{ e5 }} seconds. Granting an ally this aura effect will refund Sona {{ manarefund }} Mana once per cast.

spells.name: Song of Celerity
spells.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Sona grants herself {{ totalmstt }} Move Speed for {{ e9 }} seconds, or until damaged. She then begins a new Melody.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds that grants allied champions {{ allyms }} Move Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. Granting an ally this effect will refund Sona {{ manarefund }} Mana once per cast.

spells.name: Crescendo
spells.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: The base Cooldown of Sona's basic Abilities is reduced by {{ e3 }}%.

Active: Sona strikes an irresistible chord, Stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ rdamagecalc }} magic damage.

passive.name: Power Chord
passive.description: After 3 spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what song Sona last activated.
